br.com.trustly.scraping

Class Scraping

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.trustly.scraping.Scraping
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScrapingGitHubFiles

    public class Scraping
extends java.lang.Object
    Connects the Url to process using scrapping method and process the line and properties found in the html code
    Author:
    Leonardo Patrick

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Scraping(java.lang.String url)

      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> findAllProprety(java.lang.String find, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> props)
      Finds an html All attribute on the line or after the number of lines, considering the html segment sought The received map must contain the number of lines that will go forward or backward to find a certain attribute

      Search html code line using the html excerpt passed as a parameter
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> findLine(java.lang.String find, int advance)
      Searches for a line from a html segment, advances or rewinds the number of lines entered in the parameter and sets this line
